name: Squeek, the meek
description:
Squeek, the meek is a top-down 2D stealth game in which our hero, Squeek, is too weak to kill any enemies

Still! The enemies are not very smart and can be tricked easily!

Squeek gets into enemy camps to rescue other mice that have been kidnapped by an orc army.

This game was originally created for GBJam#6, this is a slightly more polished version.
